nodes.text: Tatooine Debriefing is a short story originally published in the Galaxy Guide 1: A New Hope. It was later included in The Movie Trilogy Sourcebook.

The story is an excerpt from the personal audio report of Stormtrooper commander DSS-0956, recounting his search for C-3PO and R2-D2 during the events of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The report was released to Rebel Alliance historian Voren Na'al by the Rebel Spy Network.
This story was titled "The Tatooine Debriefing" in the first edition release and "Tatooine Debriefing" in the second edition release.
